channel.title: Pk zone
channel.description: i would like to make a pk zone on like one side of my home .. to make it more unquie or sumthing but i dont know quite how to do it .. plz i need help i would love some advis or anythiing vids or pics or links ect.. thank you!

item.title: Pk zone
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:2, topic:478932”]Uhm this is easy and i have told this like 10000 times but go into ur player.java (i think u are PI)
search for this:

Then add some new coords under there[/quote]
That would work, but if he wants to have a separate interface drawn whenever you’re in the area, he’d have to make another boolean statement in Player.java and edit some lines of code in PlayerAssistant, ComatAssistant, and Client.java.

Read full topic
